"Geoss2Go.

"Acknowledgement: This application has been developed within the" "MyGEOSS project, which has received funding from the European" "Unionâ€™s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme.


"
"To unleash the power of this app you need to install also" "the digital field mapping app Geopaparazzi. If not already" "installed at startup you will be aided through the installation" "process.


"
"To create a new profile simply push the plus button on the upper right corner.
